titleStmt.title: A treatise of the Roman ports and forts in Kent by William Somner ; publish'd by James Brome ... ; to which is prefixt, The life of Mr. Somner.
titleStmt.author: Somner, William, 1598-1669.
Kennett, White, 1660-1728.
Brome, James, d. 1715.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"The life of Mr. Somner", by W. Kennett: 118 p.
